title: Ep. 246: Skin-Resurfacing Gone Wrong & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 246: Skin-Resurfacing Gone Wrong & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:subtitle: This week, we’re talking about why lasers, peels, and other treatments can end up making your skin look waxy—if you’re not careful. There’s also lots of beauty news to discuss: Bobbi Brown’s new brand, Jones Road Beauty; the return of curly bangs; surp...
description:
This week, we’re talking about why lasers, peels, and other treatments can end up making your skin look waxy—if you’re not careful. There’s also lots of beauty news to discuss: Bobbi Brown’s new brand, Jones Road Beauty; the return of curly bangs; surprising ways the pandemic is affecting shaving frequency; and more. Plus, is the flavor of fall fig or cardamom? -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
